participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Confident and proud of past achievements, enjoys sharing stories of success.
participant_1.background: Former athlete who participated in the Olympics, has a passion for sports and mentoring young athletes.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Curious and enthusiastic, always eager to learn from others' experiences.
participant_2.background: A sports journalist with a keen interest in Olympic events and athlete stories.

content.text: Did you know that i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.Do you have any medals?
